column4: Hello. I'm the guy who asked for the power management advice on my Ubuntu Netbook.
I just logged on to the second account and it works normally but the GUIs have changed in style.
They all look like something from the late 90s early 2000s
Could this be soemthing bigger than just power management differences/?
my ubuntu netbook on the sudo account would go black (the screen) when I put it on battery power
The other account doesnt have this problem but i just logged back in and the GUi For firefox and Xchat look completely different.
I don't do netbooks, but it does seem like a mode-switch was done, and it lost track of what it was doing.
Kinda like Tony Hawk and Sam Fisher did when you made your name. [it is gag. Relax]
You are now super spy skateboarder....That would be a sweet tv show..
I have been having battery problems before, so could this be the result of that?
Probably. Is it still under warranty?
I don't think so. I have been having these battery problems on start up for a while now
and now they are starting to manifest themselves in my usage.
Besides backing up my shit is there anything I can do to fix this netbook?
Or is it just going to be  a slow decline into oblivion.
I don't know man. Try a clean install. If it happens more, then something is wrong. I can't offer hardware support without having the device..
